name: Meatball Sub Casserole
author: sarabrola
summary: My boys LOVE this! It is quick and simple! I am always asked to bring this to Super Bowl® parties and family events!
directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Heat garlic bread with spread side up on a baking sheet in the preheated oven until warm and golden brown, 10 to 12 minutes
Reduce oven temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Bring spaghetti sauce to a boil in a large pot
Reduce heat to low and simmer until meatballs are heated through, about 20 minutes
Tear garlic bread into bite-size pieces and spread into bottom of a 9x13-inch baking dish
Pour spaghetti sauce and meatballs over garlic bread, coating bread with sauce and distributing meatballs evenly
Spread mozzarella cheese over top in a layer, followed by a layer of Parmesan cheese
Bake casserole until cheese has melted, 20 to 25 minutes
